skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if the target is under a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff. Places 2 extra hits if the target is under a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff.
skills.name: Press the Fight
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 20% if the [Decrease SPD] debuff is placed.
skills.name: Outflank

skills.desc: Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff and a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Legion's Orders
